ERROR_REPROMPT: What else can I help with?
CHANGE_CARD_TEXT:
You can change the following options:

 - HIT SOFT SEVENTEEN: whether the dealer will hit a soft 17 total. Can be ON or OFF.
 - SURRENDER: whether surrender is offered as an option. Can be ON or OFF.
 - DOUBLE DOWN: whether double down is offered or not.  Can be ON or OFF.
 - DOUBLE AFTER SPLIT: whether you can double down after splitting a pair.  Can be ON or OFF.
 - RESPLIT ACES: wheter you can resplit Aces or not.  Can be ON or OFF.
 - NUMBER OF DECKS: the number of decks in play. Can be ONE, TWO, FOUR, SIX, or EIGHT.
 - NUMBER OF SPLIT HANDS: the maximum number of hands you can have from splitting. Can be ONE, TWO, THREE, or FOUR.

For example, say "change number of decks to two" if you want to play with two decks.
Note that the deck will be shuffled if you change the rules of the game

HELP_GENERIC_HELP: You can play a game by saying Deal <break time='200ms'/> or you can say enable training mode if you would like me to prompt when your play differs from Basic Strategy. <break time='300ms'/> Now, what can I help you with?
HELP_CARD_TEXT:
You can say BET to place a bet. If no amount is mentioned, the game will use the last amount bet. You can say READ HIGH SCORES to hear the current leader board.
During a hand, ask WHAT SHOULD I DO to hear the Basic Strategy suggestion.
Say READ THE RULES if you would like to hear the rules currently in play.
CHANGE will change the rules in play. You can change the following options:

 - HIT SOFT SEVENTEEN: whether the dealer will hit a soft 17 total. Can be ON or OFF.
 - SURRENDER: whether surrender is offered as an option. Can be ON or OFF.
 - DOUBLE DOWN: whether double down is offered or not.  Can be ON or OFF.
 - DOUBLE AFTER SPLIT: whether you can double down after splitting a pair.  Can be ON or OFF.
 - RESPLIT ACES: wheter you can resplit Aces or not.  Can be ON or OFF.
 - NUMBER OF DECKS: the number of decks in play. Can be ONE, TWO, FOUR, SIX, or EIGHT.
 - NUMBER OF SPLIT HANDS: the maximum number of hands you can have from splitting. Can be ONE, TWO, THREE, or FOUR.

For example, say "change number of decks to two" if you want to play with two decks.
Note that the deck will be shuffled if you change the rules of the game
HELP_ACHIEVEMENT_POINTS: You earn 100 achievement points for every tournament win <break time='200ms'/> 10 points each day you play <break time='200ms'/> 5 points for a natural winning blackjack <break time='200ms'/> and N points for each streak of N winning hands more than one.
HELP_ACHIEVEMENT_CARD_TEXT:
You earn achievement points as you play which is how the high score board is determined. You earn points as follows:
 - 100 achievement points each time you win the Tuesday Tournament
 - 10 points each day you play
 - 5 points for a natural winning blackjack
 - N points for each streak of N winning hands more than one.

TOURNAMENT_HELP_CARD_TEXT:
You are playing in the Blackjack Game tournament. You can place up to {0} bets on a four deck shoe. Whoever has the highest bankroll at the end of the tournament wins 100 achievement points.
You can say BET to place a bet. If no amount is mentioned, the game will use the last amount bet. You can say READ HIGH SCORES to hear the current leader board.
During a hand, ask WHAT SHOULD I DO to hear the Basic Strategy suggestion.
Say READ THE RULES if you would like to hear the rules currently in play. Note that you cannot change the rules of the game during tournament play.

HELP_CARD_SUPERBONUS: Spanish 21 features a super bonus of $1000 for bets under $25 and $5000 for bets of $25 and over when three suited sevens are dealt against a dealer seven.
HELP_CARD_PROGRESSIVE_TEXT:
This game features a progressive triple seven jackpot. Place a side bet of $5 by saying PLACE SIDE BET which will stay in effect until you say REMOVE SIDE BET.
The side bet pays out $25 if your first card is a seven, $100 if your first two cards are both seven, and the progressive jackpot if your first three cards are seven. The progressive jackpot is based on aggregate play across all users of this skill.
